body: Oh, and while I agree working with reference is probably not, in my humble opinion, a good practice, some people may have to deal, like me, with legacy systems that were made for php3.

issue.title: Object passed by reference are not handled properly

body:
Thanks for the detailed bug report. This seems related to sebastianbergmann/phpunit-mock-objects#116, but I can't reproduce it yet. Can you provide the following information:

PHP version (`php -v`)
PHPUnit install method (composer, pear, etc.)

Here are the informations you requested

PHP 5.3.10-1ubuntu3 with Suhosin-Patch (cli) (built: Apr 11 2012 17:25:33) 
Copyright (c) 1997-2012 The PHP Group
Zend Engine v2.3.0, Copyright (c) 1998-2012 Zend Technologies
    with Xdebug v2.2.1, Copyright (c) 2002-2012, by Derick Rethans

Phpunit install method : PEAR
Thanks, @mroyiweb. PR #799 should solve your problem when it gets merged.
@sebastianbergmann, I believe this can be closed now.

issue.title: [Form] PHPUnit (& Travis) failing for PHP 5.3 - PHPUnit bug
issue.body:
This is not a bug in Symfony, rather a bug in PHPUnit but it should be left open for some time to save people some debugging time.

The Form Unit Tests fail with PHP 5.3:

```
230There were 4 failures:
231
2321) Symfony\Component\Form\Tests\CompoundFormTest::testBindMapsBoundChildrenOntoEmptyData
233Expectation failed for method name is equal to <string:mapFormsToData> when invoked 1 time(s)
234Parameter 1 for invocation Symfony\Component\Form\DataMapperInterface::mapFormsToData(Array (...), Array ()) does not match expected value.
235Array () does not match expected type "object".
236
237/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Form.php:586
238/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Tests/CompoundFormTest.php:393
239
2402) Symfony\Component\Form\Tests\Extension\Core\DataMapper\PropertyPathMapperTest::testMapFormsToDataWritesBackIfNotByReference
241Expectation failed for method name is equal to <string:setValue> when invoked 1 time(s)
242Parameter 0 for invocation Symfony\Component\PropertyAccess\PropertyAccessorInterface::setValue(Array (), Mock_PropertyPath_1b80f381 Object (...), stdClass Object ()) does not match expected value.
243Array () does not match expected type "object".
244
245/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Extension/Core/DataMapper/PropertyPathMapper.php:96
246/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Tests/Extension/Core/DataMapper/PropertyPathMapperTest.php:232
247
2483) Symfony\Component\Form\Tests\Extension\Core\DataMapper\PropertyPathMapperTest::testMapFormsToDataWritesBackIfByReferenceButNoReference
249Expectation failed for method name is equal to <string:setValue> when invoked 1 time(s)
250Parameter 0 for invocation Symfony\Component\PropertyAccess\PropertyAccessorInterface::setValue(Array (), Mock_PropertyPath_1b80f381 Object (...), stdClass Object ()) does not match expected value.
251Array () does not match expected type "object".
252
253/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Extension/Core/DataMapper/PropertyPathMapper.php:96
254/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Tests/Extension/Core/DataMapper/PropertyPathMapperTest.php:251
255
2564) Symfony\Component\Form\Tests\Extension\Core\DataMapper\PropertyPathMapperTest::testMapFormsToDataSkipsVirtualForms
257Expectation failed for method name is equal to <string:setValue> when invoked 1 time(s)
258Parameter 0 for invocation Symfony\Component\PropertyAccess\PropertyAccessorInterface::setValue(Array (), Mock_PropertyPath_1b80f381 Object (...), stdClass Object ()) does not match expected value.
259Array () does not match expected type "object".
260
261/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Extension/Core/DataMapper/PropertyPathMapper.php:96
262/home/travis/build/symfony/symfony/src/Symfony/Component/Form/Tests/Extension/Core/DataMapper/PropertyPathMapperTest.php:382
```

This is due to a PHPUnit bug https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/796 which will be fixed [in release 3.7.14](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/blob/3.7/ChangeLog.md#phpunit-3714)

/cc @stof @bschussek
